column4: Hi - I need help setting display resolution with my ati card. Xrand isn't available, xorg.conf listed resolutions look okay, fglrx-control(is this what i need?) wasn't added to the application menu and "fxlrx-control" doesn't seem to be a command.
did you first try "sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg"?
and can you choose resolutions that you want available?
